ctx: intros m z p i H_inv H_exd H_iter.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite Iter_plus with (p := p) (i := i) by auto.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "Iter (f ?M2275) p ?M2276" in the current goal.

ctx: intros m z p i H_inv H_exd H_iter.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) (p + i) z = Iter (f m) i z -> Iter (f m) p z = z m : fmap z : dart p, i : nat H_inv : inv_hmap m H_exd : exd m z H_iter : Iter (f m) p z = z IHi : Iter (f m) (p + i) z = Iter (f m) i z Unable to unify "f m (Iter (f m) (p + i) z)" with "Iter (f m) (p + S i) z".

original: intros m z p i H_inv H_exd H_iter. induction i. -- simpl. rewrite <- H_iter. auto. -- simpl. rewrite Iter_plus with (p := p) (i := i) by auto. rewrite <- IHi. reflexivity.
